Try building it on the pad, or in the space plane hanger, making the station core a rover. Drive it a little ways out, then make another vehicle that can dock with it and see if it works. I've heard that the Clampotron Sr. Ports are quite stable for docking, though. Haven't yet built a station with 'em.

Oh! And it's INCREDIBLY easy to put the clampotron sr. on backwards, so make sure you've got the correct side(s) facing each other. One side looks a bit 'simpler' and flatter than the other. That's the non-docking side.
